content:
Our team is growing! We've got 2 open positions in the Bay Area that should be interesting for folks here: one for a health data standards focused software engineer and one for an iOS engineer where FHIR knowledge is a plus:
https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200004050/software-engineer-health-data-standards?team=SFTWR
https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200004072/ios-software-engineer-health-data?team=SFTWR
Feel free to reach out to me directly with questions

To note, we have multiple other openings for engineers and managers in the clinical/health space in general, such as:
Health Full Stack Engineer: https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200002296/health-full-stack-engineer?team=SFTWR
Clinical Health Informaticist: https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200004009/clinical-health-informaticist?team=SFTWR
If only I hadn’t been burned by the Bay Area every other time I tried, and hadn’t started my own startup. Are any of these edible for conversion to B2B contracts?
Not at this time, no, we're really looking for full time on-site employees.
